chapters.title: Chapter 5: The Shadow in Shienar
chapters.info: Ellisande, p. 63 (56)—Name given to Eldrene, wife of Aemon al'Caar al'Thorin, king of Manetheren. The name means “Rose of the Sun.” Her country was betrayed by Tetsuan, who was then the Amyrlin Seat, out of jealousy over her abilities and influence. See also Tetsuan.
